divs: sighting detailsi also saw the stationary bright gold object under\rt side of the moon on 11\26. i was getting into my car on the way to work at 11:15pm, when i noticed it & thought it was very unusual. i wondered what it could be & was puzzled because the moon was so bright & most stars\planets would be dimmed that close to the moon. i wished i could have watched it for a longer time - it was just so interesting & out of the ordinary. the next day, i looked up different astronomy web sites to see if the professionals had any info on it - there wasn't any. who knows what it was. i like a good mystery. far west chicago 'burbs.
